statements: SELECT id, client_name, email FROM ClientInformation;
SELECT client_name, phone_number, address FROM ClientInformation WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM ClientInformation WHERE date_of_birth > '1990-01-01';
SELECT client_name, phone_number FROM ClientInformation ORDER BY client_name DESC;
SELECT id, client_name, address FROM ClientInformation WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM ClientInformation WHERE id = 1;
SELECT client_name, email FROM ClientInformation WHERE date_of_birth > '1990-01-01';
SELECT client_name, phone_number FROM ClientInformation WHERE address LIKE '%Avenue%';
SELECT * FROM ClientInformation WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1980-01-01' AND '1990-01-01';
SELECT id, client_name, email, phone_number, address, date_of_birth FROM ClientInformation WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM client_info;
SELECT client_name, client_email FROM client_info WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT client_name, client_phone FROM client_info ORDER BY client_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM client_notes WHERE client_id = 2;
SELECT note_id, note_text, timestamp FROM client_notes ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT client_name, client_email FROM client_info WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM client_info WHERE client_phone LIKE '%123%';
SELECT client_name, client_email, timestamp FROM client_info JOIN client_notes ON client_info.client_id = client_notes.client_id WHERE client_info.client_id = 1;
SELECT client_name, note_text FROM client_info JOIN client_notes ON client_info.client_id = client_notes.client_id WHERE client_notes.note_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM client_info WHERE client_phone = '555-123-4567';
SELECT * FROM clients;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM clients;
SELECT id, first_name, phone_number FROM clients WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM clients ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT id, first_name, email FROM clients WHERE first_name='John';
SELECT * FROM clients WHERE id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM clients WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT id, password_hash FROM passwords WHERE client_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM access_logs WHERE client_id = 3 ORDER BY login_time DESC;
SELECT client_id, COUNT(*) AS login_count FROM access_logs GROUP BY client_id;
SELECT * FROM clients;
SELECT client_id, client_name, client_email FROM clients WHERE client_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT client_name, client_email, client_phone FROM clients WHERE client_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT client_address, client_email FROM clients WHERE client_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174002';
SELECT * FROM client_notes ORDER BY note_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM client_notes ORDER BY note_date DESC, note_id
SELECT client_name, client_email FROM clients WHERE client_id = '3f81444b-066d-4d39-b021-2c275fa8b8a6'

SELECT client_name, contact_name, note FROM clients c JOIN client_contacts cc ON c.client_id = cc.client_id JOIN client_notes cn ON c.client_id = cn.client_id WHERE c.client_name LIKE 'A%' AND cc.contact_email LIKE '%@example.com'
SELECT client_name, file_name, file_size FROM clients c JOIN client_files cf ON c.client_id = cf.client_id WHERE file_size > 100000 ORDER BY file_size DESC
SELECT client_name, COUNT(*) AS total_notes FROM clients c JOIN client_notes cn ON c.client_id = cn.client_id GROUP BY c.client_name HAVING total_notes >= 5
SELECT * FROM clients;
SELECT client_name, client_email FROM clients WHERE client_phone IS NULL;
SELECT client_name, client_phone FROM clients ORDER BY client_name DESC;
SELECT client_name, client_email, client_phone FROM clients WHERE client_id = 'abc123';
SELECT client_name, client_email, client_phone FROM clients WHERE client_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY client_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM clients;
SELECT client_name, client_email FROM clients WHERE client_phone IS NOT NULL;
SELECT address_id, street_address, city, state, postal_code FROM addresses ORDER BY city, state DESC;
SELECT client_name, contract_id, start_date, amount FROM clients JOIN contracts ON clients.client_id = contracts.client_id WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT note_id, note_text, created_at FROM notes WHERE client_id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789012';
